climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Ergonomic Design]: Ergonomically designed into a drop-shaped foot rest that perfectly fits the arch of the foot and provides 100% comfort with perfect support for the arches. Helps to promote good sitting posture for better posture and blood circulation.

[Desk Accessories] The office foot rest measures 16.14’’x10.24’’x4.72’’, satisfying the foot size of all people, suitable for desks, sofas, gaming chairs, reading desks, dining tables, etc. The under-desk footrest is very soft and can provide you with unparalleled comfort.

[High-quality Inner Core Foot Rest]: Unlike hard plastic foot rest, CloudBliss high-quality inner core office desk footrest pillow provides all-day comfort while you are working, soft and won't deform, reducing knee joint pressure and effectively relieving foot fatigue.

[Anti-Slip Bottom] Our foot stool is suitable for any material floor, whether it is hardwood or smooth tile, the foot rest for under desk at work will stay where you need and will not slide, providing lasting support for your feet.

[Easy to Clean] The soft and comfortable fabric of the foot rest is durable and easy to clean. The removable cover with zipper can be easily detached for machine washing, which is very convenient. Please do not wash the memory foam.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It is easy to clean. The foot rest comes with a removable cover, which is easily removed and is machine washable. The bottom of the footstool is inlaid with silicone beads that provide good friction, effectively preventing sliding and causing no harm to the floor. Turn it over and use it as a rocking foot rest to stimulate your feet for better blood circulation. The soft foot rest is made of high-quality inner core that provides good resilience and offers long-lasting comfort for the feet, keeping its original shape well after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Accesory for a desktop setup
reviews.reviewText: It helped me fix a height issue I had in my desktop setup, now I can sit normally without my legs hanging off the chair, It is comfy, not extremely soft, not extremely hard, just the right spot to give your foot support, It might get dirty easily if you don't take off your shoes before use but it seems easy to clean up so no problem there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great item for desk jockeys
reviews.reviewText: I am one of those guys with a job that requires me to be on a computer all day, and I’ve had jobs like this since college (from which I graduated 24 years ago). All these years of information-based work have caused some postural issues for me. In addition to physical therapy, I am trying to make my work space in my home office more ergonomic.Having a foot rest is essential, because it keeps me from slouching forwards when I work. It alleviates back & hip pressure. I could just stack up some books, but since I use this desk area a lot, I decided to get a real foot rest.I like the one I chose here because it’s soft, comfortable and the cover is washable. I’m not a big person so it doesn’t take much to put my feet at the correct angle for optimum support. I feel like this foot rest is generously sized, so nearly anyone could use it. Also, the cover is machine washable, a nice plus. I bought the foot rest on a special deal so it was very affordable.Overall, I am very happy with this foot rest and recommend it for anyone with a desk job. Desk-jockey approved!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than pictured
reviews.reviewText: Very soft, memory foam, good footrest, but not as big as pictured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm Foam Soft Cover: I need a second one now!
reviews.reviewText: I love this for my feet under the desk and for my back while sitting in bed to read. I'll be getting a second one for sure so I'm not always moving it between the desk and the bed.Firm and soft: It is firm foam with a soft cover on one side (the angled side, and gripper on the bottom. It also has a zipper (on side and most of one edge) so the cover could be removed (but I haven't removed it yetfor cleaning - I would guess it could be washed okay , but air dry so it will fit back on the foam again after).I've been dusting it off each evening and putting a pillow case on it for reading (using it to support my lower back - against the headboard - while sitting on my bed). Then by day, it is under my feet at my desk.I would love to find this in a better shape for back support. The foam and cover are quality and the skid resistance is perfect to keep it from moving around using it. If not a better shape available I'll be buying this one again so I can use it without moving it around a lot.Note: I wouldn't need to use a pillow case on it if it wasn't on the floor all day lol - I'm just a bit OCD about it likely because I live with a cat who loves to stay by my feet most of the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars My average sized woman's hand is larger than the foot in the picture.
reviews.reviewText: My average sized woman's hand is larger than the foot in the picture. It is comfortable to use, but compresses completely when putting any weight on it. Definitely not for larger feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good foot rest
reviews.reviewText: Good foot rest. Soft. Simple. Good Stuff. Gets bigger after you remove from the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and plush
reviews.reviewText: Where has this been all my life? I spend endless hours at my desk and this foot rest is perfect for positioning my feet. It's firm yet plush and also serves to keep my feet warm in cold weather. The angle of the hump is very good for my calves and Achilles - they stretch just enough that they're not stiff at the end of the day. This has broken me of the habit of hooking my feet on the chair runners - and my legs feel much better because of that at the end of the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very soft and comfortable. I use it every time I sit at my desk. It helps me keep my posture semi correct. I say semi because it’s up to me to sit straight lol. I love it though. So glad I bought it
